Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: Looking at the event log, the main sequence seems to be RA, VF, AE, RMI, VF, SC, AD, SC, AC. So thats a main sequence of 8 activities.

Name: Inductive Reasoning - IND
Text: The main flow seems to be RA, then VF, then AE, RMI, VF, SC, AD, then SC, AC. So thats a main sequence of 8 activities.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - NE
Text: After AD, theres a loop that can choose between SC and another AD. So the loop would have AD as the parent, and children SC and AD.

Name: Backtracking - NE
Text: But in the event log, after AD, the next activities are SC, then another SC, then AC. So perhaps the loop appends SC once, then back to AD, and then another SC, then AC.

Name: Validation - NE
Text: Wait, but how If the loop is AD, -> SC, AD, then after AD, it can choose to append SC or AD. So the first choice is SC, which leads to AC. Then after adding SC, it can choose to go back to AD, leading to the next choice.

Name: Hypothesis Generation - IND
Text: The main process is a SEQUENCE of these 12 activities. Then after AD, theres a loop that appends SC once, then back to AD, then SC again, then AC.
